texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Industrial action is causing significant disruption to Southern train services this week. There will be no metro services in London on Friday 16 December."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Alternative services in south London are busier than usual, and will be especially busy on Friday","To help customers get around we are boosting London Overground services between Clapham Junction and Shepherd's Bush on Friday","For full details of the strikes, see \u003ca href=\"http://www.southernrailway.com/your-journey/strike\"\u003eSouthern's website\u003c/a\u003e "]}
We expect alternative services in South London to be busier than usual, including roads, buses, London Overground, trams and the Northern line.
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["We are increasing London Overground services between Clapham Junction and Shepherd's Bush on the strike day Friday 16 December"]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Southern are running fewer Gatwick Express services than usual","Additional coaches are running to Gatwick airport from Victoria Coach Station.","These may be very busy so please book a ticket with your coach operator in advance and allow plenty of time to travel","Find more \u003ca href=\"/modes/coaches/index\"\u003ecoach operator information\u003c/a\u003e "]}
